SEARCH
Package com.minesweeper.model

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
com.minesweeper.model.Cell
public class Cell extends Object
The Cell class represents a single cell in the Minesweeper game grid. It contains information about whether the cell is a mine, the number of adjacent mines, and its state (revealed, flagged).
